levels.description: Attacks instead fire a Compound Drug Shell (prioritizes enemies); when the shell hits, heals surrounding allies by <@ba.vup>{attack@heal_scale:0%}</> of this unit's ATK, and deals <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> Arts damage to enemies
